response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for you. This unique item is worth $1,200,000 to you, and I am excited to offer it to you today. After careful consideration, I propose to sell this product to you for $1,150,000. This price reflects its exceptional quality and the exclusivity it offers, while also allowing us to reach a fair agreement. I believe this offer presents a fantastic opportunity for both of us, ensuring you receive a valuable asset at a competitive price. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1150000}
